tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE distances (
    distance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    poi_id_from INT,
    poi_id_to INT,
    distance DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE points_of_interest (
    poi_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    poi_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    city VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE distance_matrix (
    source_poi_id INT,
    dest_poi_id INT,
    distance DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (source_poi_id, dest_poi_id)
)

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    user_id INT,
    poi_id INT,
    score DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, poi_id)
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT,
    poi_id INT,
    preference_score FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, poi_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (poi_id) REFERENCES poi_locations(poi_id)
);

CREATE TABLE distance_matrix (
    start_poi_id INT,
    end_poi_id INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (start_poi_id, end_poi_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (start_poi_id) REFERENCES poi_locations(poi_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (end_poi_id) REFERENCES poi_locations(poi_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    user_id INT,
    recommended_poi_id INT,
    relevance_score FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, recommended_poi_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (recommended_poi_id) REFERENCES poi_locations(poi_id)
);
